name: Realistic
promptAddition: The style of realism describes an art movement that aims to depict reality as accurately and faithfully as possible

name: Photographic
promptAddition: In photography, refers to a recognizable group of features that appear in a variety of photographs and reflect a particular visual or conceptual approach.

name: Minimalistic
promptAddition: Everything superfluous is removed to create a clear and concise structure.

name: Surrealistic
promptAddition: Surrealist works are often rich in symbols that refer to the unconscious and inner world of the artist.

name: Cinematic
promptAddition: The chosen means create a certain aesthetic and atmosphere that distinguishes the film from others. These include the visual design, the emotional impact, and the narrative style.

name: Portrait
promptAddition: In art, a portrait style refers to the different ways in which a portrait can be created, both in painting and photography.
